attributes.review: basically when i downloaded this app it was supposed to be informative, but instead it was just a thread of very subjective tweets about keeping little kids in cages and killing all the blacks. i was so scared that someone with so much power and authority could just be so outright racist and people still support him. after seeing this i passed away❤️. i’m mad that i actually gave this man one star, he deserves less👺

attributes.review:
In my opinion this app is terrible. It freezes and makes my phone crash. My phone is old, but I tried to uninstall and reinstall without any luck.

Difficult to navigate, design is not appealing at all.

I think the American people deserve better. Somebody should spend some money and redesign. I’m deleting and getting my Trump fix from twitter.
attributes.title: Terrible, slow, poorly designed
